name: The Tortile Chamber
description:
A game about exploring a strange room. Made for Ludum Dare 37 in under 48 hours.

Controls (also explained in-game)
-WASD: Move
-Mouse: Look
-Left/Right Click: Interact
-Space: Jump
-F4: Fullscreen
-Q: Quit
-Esc: Free the mouse

If you experience a shader error, a shader free version is available.

A black and white version is also available if the cyan is giving you issues. This version can also toggle the dither shader by pressing P
